text: Ra allahale bani isra'ilabata vaca liyo ra tiniharumadhyebata hamile bahra jana pramukhaharuko niyukti garyaum, ani allahale bhan'yo ki ma avasya timro sathama chu. Yadi timile namaja padhdai garyau ra jakata (dana) dindai garyau ra mera paigambaraharula'i mandai garyau ra tiniharuko maddata gardai garyau ra allahala'i (karje hasana) ramro rna dine garyau bhane timibata nihsandeha timra trutiharu alaga rakhidinechu ra timila'i tyasto svargama (bagainca) pravesa dine chu, jasako tala naharaharu bagirakheka chan. Tara, yasa vaca ra kabolapachi timiharumadhye kohi avajnakari bandacha bhane u pakkai satya margabata vicalita bha'i tadha pugne cha
